uk.ac.liv.auction.event
Class AgentPolledEvent

java.lang.Object
  uk.ac.liv.auction.event.AuctionEvent
      uk.ac.liv.auction.event.AgentPolledEvent

public class AgentPolledEvent
extends AuctionEvent

An event that is fired whenever any agent is polled by an auction for its shout via the requestShout() method.
